original_text: So he said to them, “Why do you do such things? I hear from all the people about these wicked deeds of yours.
korean_text: 그들에게 이르되 너희가 어찌하여 이런 일을 하느냐 내가 너희의 악행을 이 모든 백성에게서 듣노라

sentences.original_text: Why do you do such things?
I hear from all the people
about these wicked deeds of yours.
